q: Sergio Marchionne used the term`` shyster loans'' three times Friday in an address at an auto dealer's convention in San Francisco, but he issued a statement the next day expressing his regrets. I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern. I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate, Sergio Marchionne said in his statement. The Detroit News said Sunday that Steven Rattner , who was the Obama administration's`` auto czar'' during the bailout, said the loans were made at or below market rates

Speaking to Oprah Winfrey on her Master Class show, the 51-year-old music mogul recalled being kicked out of a meeting with an unknown network executive while trying to sell the singing competition with then-partners Simon W. J. Fuller and Simon Jones . It was so bad that a minute into the pitch the guy said` No'. To wind him up, I said,` So, it sounds like you're interested?' He said` Get out' and we were thrown out of the network.`` I turned to the other Simon Joness and said,` The good news is, it will never get worse than this'...[ I left with] my tail between my legs. friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. The 40-year-old Gabrielle Giffords has survived despite being shot through the head
